siteMetadata.title: Portfolio Site
siteMetadata.description: A personal portfolio website showcasing skills and projects

aboutSection.personalStory: A passionate developer with experience in modern web technologies. Currently working on various projects to showcase skills and learn new technologies.
aboutSection.professionalJourney: Started coding as a hobby and gradually developed expertise in multiple programming languages and frameworks. Always eager to take on new challenges.
aboutSection.personalInterests: When not coding, enjoys exploring new technologies, contributing to open source projects, and staying up to date with industry trends.
aboutSection.closingStatement: Constantly learning and growing in the field of software development.

blog.title: Blog
blog.comingSoonDescription: This space will feature articles about development, design, and technology.
